targets.expr: count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace) - (count(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace) or vector(0)) or count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace)
{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!="", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$name", resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}

max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))
{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!="", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$name", resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}

max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))
{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!="", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$name", namespace="$namespace", container="$name"}

max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",container="$name",resource="memory"}) by (pod))
{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!="", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$name", resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace", container="$name"}

max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace",container="$name"}) by (pod))

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod, container)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"}) by (pod, container)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"}) by (pod, container)

panels.description: 分别将 CPU 使用量除以 CPU 请求量和 CPU 限制量，为每个容器得出 2 条时间线。

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod, container)
/
max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"}) by (pod, container))

panels.title: CPU Usage(%)

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"})

max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"}))by(container)

max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"}))by(container)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"})

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"})
/ 
max(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"})) by(container, pod)

panels.description: 这个指标指的是该容器服务被限制使用的 CPU 时间
panels.title: CPU 超限时间

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (pod)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (pod)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name=~"$name.*"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)

label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)

sum(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(container_sockets{namespace="$namespace",container!=""}) by (pod))

panels.description: The number of network errors including receiving and transmitting.

targets.expr:
sum(label_replace(
  sum(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() sum(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() (sum(container_network_receive_errors_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) + sum(container_network_transmit_errors_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)))

panels.title: Network Errors
